Posts.Content: Sammie47 wrote: Hi I went to my gp with slightly painful breast a few weeks ago. She examined me and said there were no lumps and if was probably muscular. A week after that I started feeling itchy randomly all over my upper body but more so on my breast which was hurting. I called the paramedics yesterday morning as I had pain in my chest with a racing heart. The paramedics put the monitor stickers all over me but last night I noticed a rash. I have an appointment soon to see my gp again but should I go sooner ? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried Sammie47 MelissaDallas
